abilities.name: Living Forge
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn carries the heart of a forge within her, allowing her to aid her allies' progression by contributing her own gold to their item purchases. Once every few minutes, Kharra-Ryn can select an allied hero and choose an item they are currently building. She can then spend a portion of her own gold to contribute to that item's cost.

Her gold contribution is added a small bonus when contributed to the ally's item completion progress, effectively giving her a personal reduced cost on the upgrade.

abilities.name: Golden Hammer
abilities.details: Kharra-Ryn hurls her enchanted golden hammer, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit, briefly slowing down the target and reducing their physical power for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Molten Impact
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn imbues her hammer with solar energy, causing her next three basic attacks within a few seconds to deal bonus magical damage (scaling with health) and apply a stack of Molten Impact to the target.

Upon reaching three Molten Impact stacks, the target is dealt magical damage (scaling with the target's health) and gets stunned for a short duration. The stacks are then removed and can be replied again after a short cooldowns per target.

abilities.name: Power Strike
abilities.details:
Kharra-Ryn slams her hammer at a target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and knocks back the target.

Enemies that collide with the knocked back target take the same physical damage and are briefly stunned.

abilities.name: Smelting Core
abilities.details: Kharra-Ryn launches a heavy, glowing smelting core to a target location within a long range. Upon landing, the core deals magical damage (scaling with magical power) in an area, greatly slowing all enemies hit and reducing their physical resistance for few seconds.
